scripts.postinstall-cam-client-app-build: echo --Install publish submodule (posix commands used)-- && sh ./utils/cam-client-app-build-init.sh
scripts.postinstall-venv-init: echo --Install publish submodule (posix commands used)-- && sh ./utils/venv-init.sh
scripts.postinstall-UNUSED: echo --Run postinstall tasks-- && npm-run-all postinstall-cam-client-app-build postinstall-venv-init
scripts.help: echo --List all available script commands-- && npm-package-user-scripts-list
